data.name: Good Luck Have Fun
data.detailed_description:
In this game you will play a small creature attempting to navigate through a series of obstacles such as, swinging blades, hammers, boulders, and more! If you are killed by one of the many obstacles in the game you're sent back to the vary start. You will also be timed throughout the journey, and if you make it to the finish line your time will be recorded. The only thing that will be saved in this game is your best time so if you exit, you will have to restart from the beginning.

  • Watch out for various obstacles

  • When you're killed you will Ragdoll

  • Learn to love & hate this game at the same time!

  • Try to beat your best time!

  • Remember GLHF
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: A Platformer that sends you back to the start upon death, and times you while you play. Can you make it to the last island, and through the finish line? Or will the obstacles be to difficult for you to overcome.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 ver. 19043.1645 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 4500U with Radeon Graphics , 2.38 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce MX350
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
